items.title: Brazil orders Meta to suspend policy banning third-party AI chatbots from WhatsApp
items.creator: Ivan Mehta
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: Brazil orders Meta to suspend policy banning third-party AI chatbots from WhatsApp
items.content: Brazil's competition watchdog has ordered WhatsApp to put on hold its policy that bars third-party AI companies from using its business API to offer chatbots on the app. The agency has also started an investigation against the company to determine if the policy is anti-competitive.
